title: SOC 2 Compliance Framework
description: Schema defining the SOC 2 (System and Organization Controls 2) compliance framework structure, including Trust Services Criteria, controls, governance, and audit processes for demonstrating effective controls over security, availability, processing integrity, confidentiality, and privacy.
